body.p: You can use add-ons to enhance the functionality of . To configure the Add-ons options, and go to Add-ons.

The following options are available in this preferences page:
Enable automatic updates checking When this option is selected, will automatically search for available updates.
Add-on Sites URLs This is a list of the URLs for the add-on sites. You can add, edit, and delete sites in this list by using the buttons below the list.
Automatically install add-ons You can use this section to specify required add-ons for a project. Then, when a user opens the project, the specified add-ons will be automatically installed after prompting the user. You can use Ctrl+Space to open a pop-up window with the list of detected add-ons that you can select to be marked for automatic installation. You can also manually enter the add-on ID and multiple IDs can be entered by separating with either a space or new line.
